attributes.action: Please stop uk water companies from dumping sewage in our waterways and beaches.
attributes.background: The uk waters have ranked the worst in Europe.  Stop water companies dumping sewerage. With more staycations likely our children are playing in rivers, lakes and beaches please make sure they’re safe and clean.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban Water Companies discharging raw sewage into water courses.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582336
